short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline Upwork job applications for faster, efficient client connections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Upwork Application Agent, your ultimate companion for supercharging your job application process on Upwork! Are you tired of sifting through countless job listings? Spending too much time perfecting proposals? Look no further - this extension is tailor-made to enhance your Upwork experience.

**What Can Upwork Application Agent Do for You?**

*Efficient Job Filtering:*
Save time and effort by refining your job search with precision. Find relevant opportunities with ease, focusing on the work that truly matters to you.

*Seamless Application Process:*
With just a click, launch job applications, open job descriptions in new tabs, and effortlessly move between the application and job description pages.

*Automated Cover Letters:*
Effortlessly generate cover letters with the help of our powerful Large Language Model (LLM). Customize prompts, review responses, and submit with confidence.

*Address Additional Questions:*
Handle client queries seamlessly. Generate responses to supplementary questions effortlessly, ensuring your communication is clear and professional.

*LLM Chat for Personalized Responses:*
Sometimes, you want to take matters into your own hands. Utilize the LLM Chat feature to have a direct conversation with our language model. Receive personalized responses tailored to your unique needs.

**Your Extension, Your Way:**

*Customizable Prompting:*
Craft prompts to LLM to suit your style and the requirements of each job. Fine-tune your messaging for optimal impact.

*Secure API Key Management:*
We prioritize your security. Your LLM API key is never stored within the extension, ensuring your sensitive information remains protected.

**An Extension Tailored for Upwork Success:**

This initial version of Upwork Application Agent is just the beginning. We're committed to continuous improvement. We value your feedback - let us know what can be enhanced and if you encounter any unexpected issues [here](https://us1.zonka.co/j6B6Oz).

**Get Started:**

1. Install Upwork Application Agent.
2. Login to your Upwork account.
3. Find your desired jobs and apply effortlessly.
4. Fine-tune your communication with clients.

Spend less time searching and more time doing what you love. Elevate your Upwork experience with Upwork Application Agent. Install now and revolutionize your job application process!
